item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (640 points | 194 comments)
2. Faster CRDTs (2021) (132 points | 25 comments)
3. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (190 points | 36 comments)
4. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (232 points | 57 comments)
5. The Monospace Web (161 points | 32 comments)
6. Taskwarrior – CLI Task Management (49 points | 11 comments)
7. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (130 points | 39 comments)
8. DisTrO – a family of low latency distributed optimizers (50 points | 17 comments)
9. The Simple Algorithm That Ants Use to Build Bridges (2018) (40 points | 6 comments)
10. EasyPost (YC S13) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. How Chrome Accessibility Works (25 points | 8 comments)
12. KLEE Symbolic Execution Engine (28 points | 6 comments)
13. Vulnerabilities show why STARTTLS should be avoided if possible (2021) (56 points | 19 comments)
14. Launch HN: Bucket Robotics (YC S24) – Defect detection for molded and cast parts (71 points | 19 comments)
15. Rustproofing Linux (Part 1/4 Leaking Addresses) (2023) (48 points | 6 comments)
16. Tattoo ink sold on Amazon has high levels of weird and rare bacteria (42 points | 21 comments)
17. If Your World Is Not Enchanted, You're Not Paying Attention (8 points | 10 comments)
18. Anthropic publishes the 'system prompts' that make Claude tick (315 points | 193 comments)
19. Malware infiltrates Pidgin messenger's official plugin repository (114 points | 10 comments)
20. Splatt3R: Zero-Shot Gaussian Splatting from Uncalibrated Image Pairs (107 points | 24 comments)
21. U.S. Ambassador says Canadians are consuming 'unhealthy' amount of American news (169 points | 195 comments)
22. PyRoboCOP: Python-Based Robotic Control and Optimization Package (13 points | discuss)
23. Zuckerberg claims regret on caving to White House pressure on content (410 points | 775 comments)
24. A New Wave of Underwater Comms Is Coming (34 points | 13 comments)
25. Your Immune System Is Not a Muscle (142 points | 91 comments)
26. Ruby in Jupyter Notebook (166 points | 52 comments)
27. Microsoft security tools questioned for treating employees as threats (35 points | 4 comments)
28. Hackers infect ISPs with malware that steals customers' credentials (16 points | 4 comments)
29. New 0-Day Attacks Linked to China's 'Volt Typhoon' (172 points | 41 comments)
30. Why is the Oral-B iOS app almost 300 MB? And why is Colgate's app even bigger..? (198 points | 173 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
